targets.expr: (sum(irate(pgwatch_pg_stat_statements_exec_time_total{cluster='$cluster_name', node_name='$node_name', datname="$db_name"}[$__rate_interval])) + sum(irate(pgwatch_pg_stat_statements_plan_time_total{cluster='$cluster_name', node_name='$node_name', datname="$db_name"}[$__rate_interval]))) / sum(irate(pgwatch_pg_stat_statements_calls{cluster='$cluster_name', node_name='$node_name', datname="$db_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Statements time per call  (pg_stat_statements) aka latency
Age of the oldest transaction ID that has not been frozen
Age of the oldest multi-transaction ID that has not been frozen

targets.expr:
(
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="7"}) * 0 + 7 or 
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="6"}) * 0 + 6 or
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="5"}) * 0 + 5 or 
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="4"}) * 0 + 4 or 
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="3"}) * 0 + 3 or 
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="2"}) * 0 + 2 or 
    group by (schema_name, table_name, vacuum_mode) (
        pgwatch_pg_vacuum_progress_index_vacuum_count{phase="1"}) * 0 + 1
)
